00025 void NeuronModelTable::GenerateVirtualCoordinates() throw (EDLUTException){
00026         unsigned long idim,icoord;
00027         float minsca,sca,first,last;
00028         unsigned int size;
00029         for(idim=0;idim<this->ndims;idim++){ // for each dimension of the table
00030                 minsca=0;  // search for the minimum coordinate increment
00031                 for(icoord=1;icoord < this->dims[idim].size;icoord++){
00032                         sca=(this->dims[idim].coord[icoord] - this->dims[idim].coord[icoord-1]);
00033                         if(sca < minsca || minsca == 0){
00034                                 minsca=sca;
00035                         }
00036                 }
00037                 
00038                 first=this->dims[idim].coord[0];
00039                 last=this->dims[idim].coord[this->dims[idim].size-1];
00040                 this->dims[idim].vfirst=first;
00041                 this->dims[idim].vscale=minsca;
00042                 size=unsigned((last-first)/minsca+2);
00043                 this->dims[idim].vindex=(int *) new int [size];
00044                 this->dims[idim].voffset=(float *) new float [size];
00045                 if(this->dims[idim].vindex && this->dims[idim].voffset){  // create virtual coordinates
00046                         unsigned int ivind,ipos;
00047                         float coffset;
00048                         ipos=0;          // dimension coordinates must grow monotonously
00049                         for(ivind=0;ivind<size;ivind++){
00050                                 if(this->dims[idim].interp){  // interpolated dimension
00051                                         if(ipos+2 < this->dims[idim].size && this->dims[idim].coord[ipos+1] < ivind*minsca+first){
00052                                                 ipos++;
00053                                         }
00054                                         
00055                                         if(ipos+1 <  this->dims[idim].size){
00056                                                 coffset=1.0-(this->dims[idim].coord[ipos+1] - (ivind*minsca+first))/minsca;
00057                                                 
00058                                                 if(coffset < 0.0){
00059                                                         coffset=0.0;
00060                                                 }
00061                                         }else{
00062                                                 coffset=0.0;
00063                                         }
00064                                 }else{  // non interpolated dimension
00065                                         if(ipos+1 < this->dims[idim].size && (this->dims[idim].coord[ipos]+this->dims[idim].coord[ipos+1])/2 < ivind*minsca+first){
00066                                                 ipos++;
00067                                         }
00068                                         
00069                                         coffset=0.0;
00070                                         
00071                                         if(ipos+1 < this->dims[idim].size){
00072                                                 coffset=(ivind*minsca+first)/minsca + 0.5 - (this->dims[idim].coord[ipos]+this->dims[idim].coord[ipos+1])/2/minsca;
00073                                                 if(coffset < 0.0){
00074                                                         coffset=0.0;
00075                                                 }
00076                                         }
00077                                         
00078                                         if(ipos > 0 && coffset == 0.0){
00079                                                 coffset=(ivind*minsca+first)/minsca - 0.5 - (this->dims[idim].coord[ipos]+this->dims[idim].coord[ipos-1])/2/minsca;
00080                                                 
00081                                                 if(coffset > 0.0){
00082                                                         coffset=0.0;
00083                                                 }
00084                                         }
00085                                 }
00086                                 
00087                                 this->dims[idim].voffset[ivind]=coffset;
00088                                 this->dims[idim].vindex[ivind]=ipos;
00089                         }
00090                 }else{
00091                         delete [] this->dims[idim].vindex;
00092                         this->dims[idim].vindex=0;
00093                         delete [] this->dims[idim].voffset;
00094                         this->dims[idim].voffset=0;
00095                         break;
00096                 }
00097         }
00098         
00099         if(idim != this->ndims){
00100                 throw EDLUTException(7,5,4,0);
00101         }
00102         
00103 }

00105 void NeuronModelTable::LoadTable(FILE *fd) throw (EDLUTException){
00106         void **elems;
00107         unsigned long idim,totsize,vecsize;
00108         if(fread(&(this->nelems),sizeof(unsigned long),1,fd)==1){
00109                 if(this->nelems>0){
00110                         if(fread(&(this->ndims),sizeof(unsigned long),1,fd)==1){
00111                                 vecsize=1L;
00112                                 totsize=0L;
00113                                 for(idim=0;idim < this->ndims;idim++){
00114                                         if(fread(&(this->dims[idim].size),sizeof(unsigned long),1,fd)==1){
00115                                                 vecsize*=this->dims[idim].size;
00116                                                 totsize+=vecsize;
00117                                                 this->dims[idim].coord=(float *) new float [this->dims[idim].size];
00118                                                 if(this->dims[idim].coord){
00119                                                         if(fread(this->dims[idim].coord,sizeof(float),this->dims[idim].size,fd)!=this->dims[idim].size){
00120                                                                 throw EDLUTException(9,21,19,0);
00121                                                                 break;
00122                                                         }
00123                                                 }else{
00124                                                         throw EDLUTException(9,5,4,0);
00125                                                         break;
00126                                                 }
00127                                         }else{
00128                                                 throw EDLUTException(9,21,19,0);
00129                                                 break;
00130                                         }
00131                                 }
00132                                 
00133                                 if(idim==this->ndims){
00134                                         if(this->nelems != vecsize){
00135                                                 char msgbuf[80];
00136                                                 sprintf(msgbuf,"Inconsisten table (%lu elements expected)",vecsize);
00137                                                 //show_info(msgbuf);
00138                                         }
00139                                         
00140                                         elems=(void **) new float [totsize];
00141                                         if(elems){
00142                                                 unsigned long i;
00143                                                 if(fread(elems+totsize-this->nelems,sizeof(float),this->nelems,fd) == this->nelems){
00144                                                         vecsize=1L;
00145                                                         totsize=0L;
00146                                                         for(idim=0;idim < this->ndims-1;idim++){
00147                                                                 vecsize*=this->dims[idim].size;
00148                                                                 for(i=0;i < vecsize;i++){
00149                                                                         *(elems+totsize+i)=elems+totsize+vecsize+i*this->dims[idim+1].size;
00150                                                                 }
00151                                                                 totsize+=vecsize;
00152                                                         }
00153                                                         
00154                                                         this->elems=elems;
00155                                                         GenerateVirtualCoordinates();
00156                                                 }else{
00157                                                         throw EDLUTException(9,21,19,0);
00158                                                 }
00159                                         }else{
00160                                                 throw EDLUTException(9,5,4,0);
00161                                         }
00162                                 }
00163                         }else{
00164                 throw EDLUTException(9,21,19,0);
00165                         }
00166                 }else{
00167                         throw EDLUTException(9,23,19,0);
00168                 }
00169         }else{
00170                 throw EDLUTException(9,22,19,0);
00171         }
00172 }

00174 void NeuronModelTable::LoadTableDescription(FILE *fh, long & Currentline) throw (EDLUTFileException){
00175         int previntdim;
00176         int nv;
00177                                                                 
00178     this->elems=0;
00179         this->interp=0;
00180         skip_comments(fh,Currentline);
00181         
00182         if(fscanf(fh,"%li",&this->ndims)==1){
00183                 previntdim=-1;
00184                 this->firstintdim=-1;
00185                 for(nv=this->ndims-1;nv>=0;nv--){
00186                         this->dims[nv].coord=0;
00187                         this->dims[nv].vindex=0;
00188                         this->dims[nv].voffset=0;
00189                         if(fscanf(fh,"%i",&this->dims[nv].statevar)!=1 || 
00190                                 fscanf(fh,"%i",&this->dims[nv].interp)!=1){
00191                                 throw EDLUTFileException(13,39,3,1,Currentline);
00192                         }else{
00193                                 if(this->dims[nv].interp){
00194                                         if(this->firstintdim==-1){
00195                                                 this->firstintdim=nv;
00196                                         }else{
00197                                                 this->dims[previntdim].nextintdim=previntdim-nv;
00198                                         }
00199                                         previntdim=nv;
00200                                         this->interp=this->dims[nv].interp;
00201                                 }else{
00202                                 this->dims[nv].nextintdim=1; // useless value
00203                                 }
00204                         }
00205                 }
00206                         
00207                 if(previntdim != -1){
00208                         this->dims[previntdim].nextintdim=previntdim-nv;
00209                 }
00210         }else{
00211                 throw EDLUTFileException(13,38,3,1,Currentline);
00212         }
00213 }

00248 float NeuronModelTable::TableAccessDirect(float statevars[MAXSTATEVARS]){
00249         unsigned int idim,tind;
00250         float elem;
00251         void **cpointer;
00252         NeuronModelTable *tab;
00253         NeuronModelTable::TableDimension *dim;
00254         tab=this;
00255         cpointer=(void **)tab->elems;
00256         for(idim=0;idim<tab->ndims-1;idim++){
00257                 dim=&tab->dims[idim];
00258                 tind=table_indcomp2(dim,statevars[dim->statevar]);
00259                 cpointer=(void **)cpointer[tind];
00260         }
00261         dim=&tab->dims[idim];
00262         tind=table_indcomp2(dim,statevars[dim->statevar]);
00263         elem=((float *)cpointer)[tind];
00264         return(elem);
00265 }

00267 // Bilineal interpolation
00268 float NeuronModelTable::TableAccessInterpBi(float statevars[MAXSTATEVARS]){
00269         unsigned int idim;
00270         float elem,coord,*coords;
00271         NeuronModelTable *tab;
00272         NeuronModelTable::TableDimension *dim;
00273         int intstate[MAXSTATEVARS]={0};
00274         float subints[MAXSTATEVARS];
00275         float coeints[MAXSTATEVARS];
00276         void  **dpointers[MAXSTATEVARS];
00277         int tableinds[MAXSTATEVARS];
00278 
00279         tab=this;
00280         dpointers[0]=(void **)tab->elems;
00281 
00282         for(idim=0;idim<tab->ndims;idim++){
00283                 dim=&tab->dims[idim];
00284                 coord=statevars[dim->statevar];
00285                 if(dim->interp){
00286                         coords=dim->coord;
00287                         if(coord>last_coord(dim)){
00288                                 tableinds[idim]=dim->size-2;
00289                                 coeints[idim]=1;
00290                         }else{
00291                                 if(coord<dim->vfirst){
00292                                         tableinds[idim]=0;
00293                                         coeints[idim]=0;
00294                                 }else{
00295                                         tableinds[idim]=table_ind_int(dim,coord);
00296                                         coeints[idim]=((coord-coords[tableinds[idim]])/(coords[tableinds[idim]+1]-coords[tableinds[idim]]));
00297                                 }
00298                         }
00299                 } else {
00300                         tableinds[idim]=table_indcomp2(dim,coord);
00301                 }
00302         }
00303         
00304         idim=0;
00305         do{
00306                 for(;idim<tab->ndims-1;idim++){
00307                         dpointers[idim+1]=(void **)dpointers[idim][tableinds[idim]+intstate[idim]];
00308                 }
00309                 
00310                 elem=((float *)dpointers[idim])[tableinds[idim]+intstate[idim]];
00311 
00312                 for(idim=tab->firstintdim;idim>=0;idim-=tab->dims[idim].nextintdim){
00313                         intstate[idim]=!intstate[idim];
00314                         if(intstate[idim]){
00315                                 subints[idim]=elem;
00316                                 break;
00317                         }else{
00318                                 elem=subints[idim]=subints[idim]+(elem-subints[idim])*coeints[idim];
00319                         }
00320                 }
00321         } while(idim>=0);
00322    
00323         return(elem);
00324 }

00326 // Lineal interpolation
00327 float NeuronModelTable::TableAccessInterpLi(float statevars[MAXSTATEVARS]){
00328         unsigned int idim,iidim;
00329         float elem,elemi,elem0,coord,*coords;
00330         NeuronModelTable *tab;
00331         NeuronModelTable::TableDimension *dim;
00332         float coeints[MAXSTATEVARS];
00333         void **dpointers[MAXSTATEVARS],**dpointer;
00334         int tableinds[MAXSTATEVARS];
00335 
00336         tab=this;
00337         dpointers[0]=(void **)tab->elems;
00338 
00339         for(idim=0;idim<tab->ndims;idim++){
00340                 dim=&tab->dims[idim];
00341                 coord=statevars[dim->statevar];
00342                 if(dim->interp){
00343                         coords=dim->coord;
00344                         if(coord>last_coord(dim)){
00345                                 tableinds[idim]=dim->size-2;
00346                                 coeints[idim]=1;
00347                         }else{
00348                                 if(coord<dim->vfirst){
00349                                         tableinds[idim]=0;
00350                                         coeints[idim]=0;
00351                                 }else{
00352                                         tableinds[idim]=table_ind_int(dim,coord);
00353                                         coeints[idim]=((coord-coords[tableinds[idim]])/(coords[tableinds[idim]+1]-coords[tableinds[idim]]));
00354                                 }
00355                         }
00356                 }else{
00357                         tableinds[idim]=table_indcomp2(dim,coord);
00358                 }
00359         }
00360         
00361         for(idim=0;idim<tab->ndims-1;idim++){
00362                 dpointers[idim+1]=(void **)dpointers[idim][tableinds[idim]];
00363         }
00364         
00365         elemi=elem0=((float *)dpointers[idim])[tableinds[idim]];
00366 
00367         for(iidim=tab->firstintdim;iidim>=0;iidim-=tab->dims[iidim].nextintdim){
00368                 dpointer=dpointers[iidim];
00369                 for(idim=iidim;idim<tab->ndims-1;idim++){
00370                         dpointer=(void **)dpointer[tableinds[idim]+(idim==iidim)];
00371                 }
00372                 elem=((float *)dpointer)[tableinds[idim]+(idim==iidim)];
00373                 elemi+=(elem-elem0)*coeints[iidim];
00374         }
00375         
00376         return(elemi);
00377 }

00391

00393                 dim=&tab->dims[idim];

00396                         coords=dim->coord;
00397                         if(coord>last_coord(dim)){
00398                                 tableinds[idim]=dim->size-2;
00399                         }else{
00400                                 if(coord<dim->vfirst){

00403                                         tableinds[idim]=table_ind_int(dim,coord);
00404                                 }
00405                         }
00406

00410                 }
00411         }

00415         }

00418

00421                 for(idim=iidim;idim<tab->ndims-1;idim++){

00423                 }
00424                 elem=((float *)dpointer)[tableinds[idim]+(idim==iidim)];
00425                 elemi+=(elem-elem0)*coeints[iidim];
00426         }
00427         
00428         return(elemi);

00431 // 2-position lineal interpolation
00432 float NeuronModelTable::TableAccessInterp2Li(float statevars[MAXSTATEVARS]){
00433         unsigned int idim,iidim,nintdims,zpos;
00434         float elem,elemi,elem0,avepos,coord,*coords;
00435         NeuronModelTable *tab;
00436         NeuronModelTable::TableDimension *dim;
00437         float coeints[MAXSTATEVARS];
00438         void **dpointers[MAXSTATEVARS],**dpointer;
00439         int tableinds[MAXSTATEVARS];
00440 
00441         tab=this;
00442         dpointers[0]=(void **)tab->elems;
00443 
00444         avepos=0;
00445         nintdims=0;
00446         for(idim=0;idim<tab->ndims;idim++){
00447                 dim=&tab->dims[idim];
00448                 coord=statevars[dim->statevar];
00449                 if(dim->interp){
00450                         coords=dim->coord;
00451                         if(coord>last_coord(dim)){
00452                                 tableinds[idim]=dim->size-2;
00453                                 coeints[idim]=1;
00454                         }else{
00455                                 if(coord<dim->vfirst){
00456                                         tableinds[idim]=0;
00457                                         coeints[idim]=0;
00458                                 }else{
00459                                         tableinds[idim]=table_ind_int(dim,coord);
00460                                         coeints[idim]=((coord-coords[tableinds[idim]])/(coords[tableinds[idim]+1]-coords[tableinds[idim]]));
00461                                 }
00462                         }
00463                         
00464                         avepos+=coeints[idim];
00465                         nintdims++;
00466                 }else{
00467                         tableinds[idim]=table_indcomp2(dim,coord);
00468                 }
00469         }
00470     
00471     zpos=(avepos/nintdims)>0.5;
00472     if(zpos){
00473         for(iidim=tab->firstintdim;iidim>=0;iidim-=tab->dims[iidim].nextintdim){
00474                 tableinds[iidim]++;
00475                 coeints[iidim]=coeints[iidim]-1;
00476         }
00477     }
00478     
00479     zpos=zpos*-2+1; // pos=1 or -1
00480     for(idim=0;idim<tab->ndims-1;idim++){
00481         dpointers[idim+1]=(void **)dpointers[idim][tableinds[idim]];
00482     }
00483     
00484     elemi=elem0=((float *)dpointers[idim])[tableinds[idim]];
00485 
00486         for(iidim=tab->firstintdim;iidim>=0;iidim-=tab->dims[iidim].nextintdim){
00487                 dpointer=dpointers[iidim];
00488                 for(idim=iidim;idim<tab->ndims-1;idim++){
00489                         dpointer=(void **)dpointer[tableinds[idim]+zpos*(idim==iidim)];
00490                 }
00491                 
00492                 elem=((float *)dpointer)[tableinds[idim]+zpos*(idim==iidim)];
00493                 elemi+=(elem-elem0)*coeints[iidim];
00494         }
00495    
00496         return(elemi);
00497 }

00499 // n-position lineal interpolation
00500 float NeuronModelTable::TableAccessInterpNLi(float statevars[MAXSTATEVARS]){
00501         int idim,iidim;
00502         float elem,elemi,elem0,coord,*coords;
00503         NeuronModelTable *tab;
00504         NeuronModelTable::TableDimension *dim;
00505         int intstate[MAXSTATEVARS];
00506         float coeints[MAXSTATEVARS];
00507         void **dpointers[MAXSTATEVARS],**dpointer;
00508         int tableinds[MAXSTATEVARS];
00509 
00510         tab=this;
00511         dpointers[0]=(void **)tab->elems;
00512 
00513         for(idim=0;idim<tab->ndims;idim++){
00514                 dim=&tab->dims[idim];
00515                 coord=statevars[dim->statevar];
00516                 if(dim->interp){
00517                         coords=dim->coord;
00518                         if(coord>last_coord(dim)){
00519                                 tableinds[idim]=dim->size-2;
00520                                 coeints[idim]=1;
00521                         }else{
00522                                 if(coord<dim->vfirst){
00523                                         tableinds[idim]=0;
00524                                         coeints[idim]=0;
00525                                 }else{
00526                                         tableinds[idim]=table_ind_int(dim,coord);
00527                                         coeints[idim]=((coord-coords[tableinds[idim]])/(coords[tableinds[idim]+1]-coords[tableinds[idim]]));
00528                                 }
00529                         }
00530                         
00531                         if(coeints[idim]>0.5){
00532                                 coeints[idim]=1-coeints[idim];
00533                                 intstate[idim]=1;
00534                         }else{
00535                                 intstate[idim]=0;
00536                         }
00537                 }else{
00538                         tableinds[idim]=table_indcomp2(dim,coord);
00539                         intstate[idim]=0;
00540         }
00541         }
00542    
00543         for(idim=0;idim<tab->ndims-1;idim++){
00544                 dpointers[idim+1]=(void **)dpointers[idim][tableinds[idim]+intstate[idim]];
00545         }
00546         
00547         elemi=elem0=((float *)dpointers[idim])[tableinds[idim]+intstate[idim]];
00548 
00549         for(iidim=tab->firstintdim;iidim>=0;iidim-=tab->dims[iidim].nextintdim){
00550                 dpointer=dpointers[iidim];
00551                 for(idim=iidim;idim<tab->ndims-1;idim++){
00552                         dpointer=(void **)dpointer[tableinds[idim]+(intstate[idim]^(idim==iidim))];
00553                 }
00554                 
00555                 elem=((float *)dpointer)[tableinds[idim]+(intstate[idim]^(idim==iidim))];
00556                 elemi+=(elem-elem0)*coeints[iidim];
00557         }
00558         
00559         return(elemi);
00560 }
